metadata.title: CVE-2018-10777 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - untriaged
metadata.description: Buffer overflow in the WriteMP3GainAPETag function in apetag.c in mp3gainthrough 1.5.2-r2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: mp3gain: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
